description: Orphaned by a Gamilas planet bomb attack, Kodai Susumu was driven to follow in his older brother Mamoru`s footsteps and join the Earth Defence Force. He is initially hot-headed and prone to bursts of anger, and at first blames Captain Okita for the death of his brother in battle. However, he matures during the first season thanks to his responsibility as the Yamato`s battle chief.
name: Kodai Susumu
